name: Aqua jammer
description:
In this submarine game, you will have to find your enemies with your sonar and destroy them with torpedoes. However, you can’t completely trust your sonar, since your opponents own jammers and stealthy submarines.

Controls : arrows to move, right click to launch a sonar, left click to launch a torpedo, scroll to zoom in or out, and press on the mousse's wheel to send a mega sonar and scan the map.

When you reach the end of the map, your submarine will turn in direction of the center of the map
